mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_id, imp_uid, merchant_uid, amount, pay_status, paid_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{amount}, #{payStatus}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, imp_uid, merchant_uid, amount, pay_status, paid_at, cancelled_at FROM payment WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid}
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET pay_status = #{payStatus}, imp_uid = #{impUid}, paid_at = NOW() WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid}
